title: MBMBaM 479: Face 2 Face: A Spectral, Horny Build-A-Bear
description: This live show, from our recent tour stop in Pittsburgh, will probably go down in history as “the one where we unknowingly distributed 100 KFC Doughnut Chicken Sandwiches to our audience, who, for some reason did not instantly turn against us.” We like to think of it … well, we don’t like to think of it. We did an unconscionable thing to you, our dear, dear listeners.
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
